00038 //----------------------------------------------------------
00039 URef< GrQuery >
00040 GrQueryMgr::GetQuery( GrQuery::EQUERYTYPE type )
00041 {
00043         QueryArray& queryArray = _queries[ type ];
00044 
00046         unsigned int queryCount = queryArray.GetElemCount();
00047         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < queryCount; ++i )
00048         {
00050                 if ( queryArray[ i ]->GetRef() == 1 )
00051                         return queryArray[ i ];
00052         }
00053 
00056         GrQuery* newQuery = new GrQuery( type );
00057         queryArray.Push( newQuery );
00058 
00060         return newQuery;
00061 }

00064 void
00065 GrQueryMgr::PreContextReset()
00066 {
00068         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < GrQuery::EQT_COUNT; ++i )
00069         {
00070                 QueryArray& queryArray = _queries[ i ];
00071                 unsigned int queryCount = queryArray.GetElemCount();
00072                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < queryCount; ++j )
00073                         queryArray[ j ]->PreContextReset();
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------
00078 void
00079 GrQueryMgr::PostContextReset()
00080 {
00082         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < GrQuery::EQT_COUNT; ++i )
00083         {
00084                 QueryArray& queryArray = _queries[ i ];
00085                 unsigned int queryCount = queryArray.GetElemCount();
00086                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < queryCount; ++j )
00087                         queryArray[ j ]->PostContextReset();
00088         }
00089 }
